channel.title: VERY Good Torrent Site - Demonoid.com - OPEN!
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt]Please, once you sign up, create 3 invitational codes and post them here. If you remember what code you used. Please post it so I can erase it off the board. Thanks.[/size][/center]
[url=http://www.demonoid.com]www.Demonoid.com - Tons of good clean torrents![/url]
Demonoid Registration: [size=12pt][b]OPEN![/b][/size]
[url=http://www.demonoid.com/faq.php#ui_1]FAQ: Why is Demonoid's registration so volatile?[/url] - ANSWERED
[url=http://www.utorrent.com/beginners-guide.php]FAQ: Please explain to me what Torrents are![/url]
The only problem is that registration keeps going on and off all the time and the only way to download torrents is to sign up. So you might as well sign up.
If anyone is interested here are some registration codes. Please only use them if registration is closed. Otherwise you do not need registration codes to sign up. Thank you.
Enjoy. I'll update the registration codes once they have been used up.
If you own a demonoid.com account, please make some registration codes by logging in, look to the top right and click on control panel, and the first category should be called Invitations. Just click on the Create Invitation Code button 3 times, and paste the code here. It would be really nice since a lot of people will just come to this thread, take the invitation codes, and leave. DONT DO THAT.
Please, once you sign up, create 3 invitational codes and post them here. Please post the code you used so I can erase it off this topic. Thanks.
~Ron
Many Thanks to These People for contributing their codes: - Listed in the order received [b]Ron, White Castle, poopy4231, TheMaestro, PI55ED, S!ms, ShadowZ, pat-s, daviddude36, mynameisher0, Big Words, Mmmk, exps35, newbiehacker, The Un-Named, ShadowZ, Cheesehunk, pat-s, w0ww, ryefox2, theripcity32, afi, Super Newb, MoO, exps35, Scyther, Taios, uber killer, dazkilla, Zach1188[/b]

item.title: VERY Good Torrent Site - Demonoid.com - OPEN!
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

The site itself is shut down. The owner says it’s because of some server issues, but there is also a dutch company called BREIN (an organisation that tries to get internet piracy down) that claims they are trying to get the site down. That is because the servers are in the Netherlands. But I read somewhere that the fileservers and trackers are in Russia or something, so you can still use the tracker.

Read full topic
